lines: So, this is Gundu's new home? It makes Linu Vanu uneasy to accept charity from the Zundu, but he must nonetheless be grateful for netherling's help, and Sister's.
To rely on the Zundu makes Linu Vanu uneasy, but any arrangement is better than suffering under Vundu.
A chief must protect his people. Linu keeps Gundu safe from Vundu menace!
Netherling, for generations will they tell tales of Chief Honu's defeat! Zundu and Gundu celebrate their victory as brothers!
As long as our tribes stand together as one, then we have nothing to fear from the Vundu!
Would that Linu Vanu accompany you in your quest, Forename. But Azys Lla is no place for us to tread. Vanu tradition leaves no doubt about this, and tradition must be obeyed.
Forename. The dance you and Linu Vali have brought forth was truly a sight to behold—as bright as if the sun and the moon shone as one in the same sky.
The Vundu will be no match for us now. They will scatter as cowardly korrigans in the face of a thunderous storm!

obj.n: Un cadeau qui se mange sans faim
La fièvre de L'Écume des cieux
Une danse, mais pas un cha-cha
Une amitié germée du chaos semé
